name: ARIA
0:
”Alexa, play aria classical”
”Alexa, ask aria classical what is playing”
”Alexa, ask aria classical who's on air now”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: aria classical
des:
Enjoy the world's finest classical music tunes - all the good bits, and none of the boring bits, and presented with friendly commentary from English speaking hosts, based just out of Houston, Texas.

Reaching back to Bach and Beethoven, and going all the way forward to Bernstein, John Barry and John Williams, you can enjoy carefully selected beautiful music you're sure to love.

To start, just say "Alexa, play aria classical", or "Alexa, open aria classical". You can ask Alexa the name of any song by saying "Alexa, ask aria classical what's this song?". And, to stop the stream, simply say "Alexa, stop".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
